What I'm doing now

At a high-level I'm working on sprucing up my online presence and portfolio. I'm looking for some remote work I can do from Taiwan, preferably in JS/React, contract or otherwise. Hit me up!

Coding

I am working to finish up keybase-chat-tui, a rust terminal UI that I started a few months ago that didn't quite make it over the finish line. I was inspired to come back to it after seeing a couple of nice projects like cordless (Discord client) and spotify-tui.
